item.title: Where, oh where did my budget disappear to?
item.description:
Nearing the end of the first quarter, many users begin adjusting their budgets and forecasts for the rest of the year. It’s common for users to accidentally delete or modify their budgets, so it’s important to review some guidelines for using budget windows in Microsoft Dynamics GP. Let’s start with the Budget Maintenance window, accessed through Cards»Financial»Budget, then choosing either Open»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP or New»Using Microsoft Dynamics GP. It’s crucial to remember that this window modifies the ENTIRE BUDGET unless a specific range is selected using the Ranges button...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/where-oh-where-did-my-budget-disappear-to/

item.title: You Pay Too Much For Phone Service
item.description:
A recent study reveals that a majority of cellphone and landline users spend more than they should on their phone services, often significantly exceeding reasonable costs. This overpayment can be as high as $3 per minute for landlines and $3 overall for cell phones. While it’s easy to assume this doesn’t apply to you, it’s worth examining your phone usage closely. Have you analyzed your phone bills recently? The results might surprise you...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/you-pay-too-much-for-phone-service/
